name: Outlanders Chronicles Demo
description:
Howdy! Outlanders Chronicles is a casual first person puzzle game with lite RPG elements. Complete the trials on each island to progress to the next island. 

Will you be able to restore the gateways to working order? 

This was my demo shown off at GaMaYo event with some feedback included if you have any just let me know!

Controls: 

WASD: Movement

Shift: Run

Spacebar: Jump

Right click: Used to throw items

Left click: Used to pick up items
